mapper.insert: insert into QUESTIONS (U_ID, P_ID, QTITLE, QCONTENT, QTYPE, QCREATED_TIME, QMODIFIED_TIME) values (#{u_id}, #{p_id}, #{qtitle}, #{qcontent}, #{qtype}, systimestamp, systimestamp)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QUESTIONS A JOIN PRODUCTS B ON A.P_ID = B.ID WHERE A.QTYPE IN ('배송', '재입고', '기타 상품문의') AND A.P_ID = #{p_id} ORDER BY A.ID DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, ID, U_ID, P_ID, QTITLE, QCONTENT, QTYPE, QCREATED_TIME, QMODIFIED_TIME, IS_ANSWERED, QREPLYCREATED_TIME FROM QUESTIONS A JOIN PRODUCTS B ON A.P_ID = B.ID WHERE A.QTYPE IN ('배송', '재입고', '기타 상품문의') AND A.P_ID = #{p_id} ORDER BY A.ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{pageNum} * {amount}) ) WHERE R > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUESTIONS A JOIN PRODUCTS B ON A.P_ID = B.ID WHERE A.QTYPE IN ('배송', '재입고', '기타 상품문의') AND A.P_ID = #{p_id} ORDER BY A.ID DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUESTIONS WHERE QTYPE IN ('취소관련', '주문관련', '회원정보', '서비스', '기타') ORDER BY ID DESC;
select * from QUESTIONS where QTYPE IN ('취소관련', '주문관련', '회원정보', '서비스', '기타') order by ID desc
select * from QUESTIONS order by ID desc
select q.* from QUESTIONS Q JOIN USERS U ON q.u_id = u.id where q.u_id = #{u_id} order by q.id desc
mapper.update: update QUESTIONS set QTITLE = #{qtitle}, QCONTENT = #{qcontent}, QMODIFIED_TIME = systimestamp where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT q.id as q_id, q.qtitle as qcontent, q.is_answered as is_answered, q.qtype as qtype, q.qcreated_time as qcreated_time, q.qtitle as qtitle, q.qreplycreated_time as qreplycreate_time, u.uname as u_id FROM questions q JOIN users u ON q.u_id = u.id

SELECT q.id as q_id, q.qtitle as qcontent, q.is_answered as is_answered, q.qtype as qtype, q.qcreated_time as qcreated_time, q.qtitle as qtitle, q.qreplycreated_time as qreplycreate_time, u.uname as u_id FROM questions q JOIN users u ON q.u_id = u.id order by IS_ANSWERED desc, QCREATED_TIME

SELECT q.id as q_id, q.qtitle as qcontent, q.is_answered as is_answered, q.qtype as qtype, q.qcreated_time as qcreated_time, q.qtitle as qtitle, q.qreplycreated_time as qreplycreate_time, u.uname as u_id FROM questions q JOIN users u ON q.u_id = u.id where q.id = #{id}
